Tag.description: A tag that can be added to an ElastiCache subnet group. Tags are composed of a Key/Value pair. You can use tags to categorize and track all your subnet groups. A tag with a null Value is permitted.

properties.name: CacheSubnetGroupName
properties.description: The name for the cache subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string.

type.description: The name for the cache subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description for the cache subnet group.

type.description: The description for the cache subnet group.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the cache subnet group.

type.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the cache subnet group.
